attributes.additional_details:
To whom it concerns.

Sir David Attenborough has, for most of his life, educated everyone, including school teachers, college teachers and so on, the bennefits of his world travels, about all earth issues and species. This includes global warnings, all wildlife and the benefit to the world as a whole, and much more.
It is a long overdue, an award as a 'LORD' for this man, who has risked life and limb, that this petition has been made,
PLEASE sign, and get this honourable man his reward.
